https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y4vMso2nzYsZ1VJDx0jrtZyheRw.jpg Documents the saga of thousands of Jews hidden in shelters in Vienna and Bratislava in the hope of embarking on the 'Atlantic' - a makeshift vessel which would hopefully take them to safety. Atlantic Drift
